nl: show me games made by Valve
sql: SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE developer LIKE '%developer%';

nl: what are the top 5 most expensive games
sql: SELECT * FROM steam_games ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE genres LIKE '%genre%';

nl: which games have the most positive ratings
sql: SELECT * FROM steam_games ORDER BY positive_ratings DESC LIMIT 10;

nl: show me all the free to play games

sql: SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE categories LIKE '%mode%';

nl: list total price of all games

sql: SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE developer LIKE '%developer%';
SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE genres LIKE '%genre%';
SELECT * FROM steam_games WHERE categories LIKE '%mode%';
